Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s still entertaining to me because there was something new to discover everytime and because all of these things have their reasons according to parody or referential purposes. Brotherly love between men, “lesbian” kisses, incest-related imagery that make us participants in both parties and butterflies that dive into Xavier’s butt…
